action.content:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

principal

Related words are:

- star
- main
- chief

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!

CLUE: At the top of the hierarchy, this person holds authority and oversees operations.

GUESS: Is it "supervisor"?

CLUE: Correct, but more specifically, this person is responsible for the overall management of an institution or organization.

GUESS: Is it "administrator"?

CLUE: Yes, you're getting closer! This person is also the highest-ranking official in a school or educational institution.

at the top of the hierarchy this person holds authority and oversees operations

guess is it supervisor

 correct but more specifically this person is responsible for the overall management of an institution or organization

guess is it administrator

 yes youre getting closer this person is also the highestranking official in a school or educational institution

You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: At the top of the hierarchy, this person holds authority and oversees operations.

GUESS: Is it "supervisor"?

CLUE: Correct, but more specifically, this person is responsible for the overall management of an institution or organization.

GUESS: Is it "administrator"?

CLUE: Yes, you're getting closer! This person is also the highest-ranking official in a school or educational institution.

GUESS: Based on the clues provided, I believe the target word is "principal". The principal is the highest-ranking official in a school or educational institution and is responsible for the overall management of the institution.

based on the clues provided i believe the target word is principal the principal is the highestranking official in a school or educational institution and is responsible for the overall management of the institution

GUESS: Based on the clues provided, I believe the target word is "principal". The principal is the highest-ranking official in a school or educational institution and is responsible for the overall management of the institution.
Congratulations! You have successfully guessed the target word "principal" within three tries. Both of us have won the game. Great job in deducing the meaning from the clues provided!
